name: Acidman
overview: A game based on Pac-Man by Markt & Technik and released in 64'er Sonderheft 49. Collect the little green dots while avoiding the ghosts. However, this differs from Pac-Man in that there are NO power pills, so you cannot actually kill the ghosts, instead you have to survive and advance to the following level by avoiding the ghosts until all the green dots are collected on the screen.
